taskmaster.initial_brief: I need a new mobile app for tracking personal fitness goals. It should be fun and engaging.

architecture.architecture_doc:
Architecture document for FitnessTrackerApp based on user idea: I need a new mobile app for tracking personal fitness goals. It should be fun and engaging.
Incorporating feedback: User retention is key. Gamification might be important. Mobile-first approach preferred.
Considering constraints: Team has strong Python and React skills. Initial deployment on AWS. Budget for external services is moderate.
Aligned with technical vision: A modular microservices architecture is preferred for scalability. Prioritize user data privacy.
technology_stack: Elasticsearch for search capabilities based on market research.
